items.title: Moored Penguin
items.description: Compact and sleek. It will always find a way out of your pocket.

items.title: Crumpô
items.description: Store more by storing less! These bottlô may fit less liquid than an ordinary bottle, but you can fit more of them in the same space! So buy more!

items.title: InvisiBlue
items.description: It's almost as if it's not there... Better check.

items.title: Plask
items.description: It's like flask, but with "P" in it.

items.title: Desertflage
items.description: Invisible in the sand as all things should be. Now comes in packs of twenty! You know you'll lose some.

items.title: Pet Bottlô
items.description: Why not buy yourself a friend? We call it Antonio. You can call it whatever you want, it doesn't listen anyway.

items.title: A-bunch-o Bottlô
items.description: A starter, three bottlô kit for your everyday hydration! There's four on the picture but you only get three.

items.title: Ôrdinaire
items.description: Look, it's not all about style or function. Sometimes you just need a bottle and Ôrdinaire is here for you.

items.title: Advent
items.description: Behold the first walking bottlô with experimental technology Sea Legs™ in action! All instances of Advent bottlô walking away from their owner are probably their fault.

items.title: Silence of the Bottlô
items.description: Why count sheep when you can count Bottlô? And if that doesn't cure your insomnia the contents surely will.

items.title: Spôt
items.description: Wherever this bottlô goes this petal looking mold follows. According to our sales statistics - a perfect gift!

items.title: Pupplô
items.description: A land version of your fvourite Pet Bottlô. Puppy is not included. And so is the leash.

items.title: Eruptiôn
items.description: Unleash a powerful blast of liquid with our 20 psi sealed Eruptiôn. Do not aim Eruptiôn at yourself, other people, animals, and/or light structures.

items.title: Desertflage single
items.description: Test your luck by buying a Desertflage single. And come back buying our twenty pack bundle once you've lost it!

items.title: Lightô
items.description: This bottlô comes with an entire photo set so it can look as cool as this image of it. Assembly required.

items.title: Sturgeôn
items.description: This genetically engineered bottlô shares most of its DNA with a fish. Buy one and get a lifetime replacement supply every time Sturgeôn swims away to spawn!

items.title: Stegnotíriô
items.description: A unique storage design for all your bottlôs! A must have for any collectôr!
